fields.Name: Miro
fields.Brief description of the provider: Miro Boards provides collaborative whiteboard for startups.
fields.What you get:
💰$1,000 in credits for Miro and professional Miro.com features (more info reach out to startups@miro.com)
     (Remark: Through the microsoft for start-ups perk, you can get credits worth $1,500 for teams < 9, go check it out!)
fields.Caveats, Conditions, Catch: - New to Miro
fields.How to get it:
1. Apply here: https://miro.com/startups/partner/apply/?vcode=489-323331-XPRENEURS%20by%20UnternehmerTUM%20GmbH

2. Select: XRPENEURS from the accelerator dropdown menu.
3. Requirements:
         Startups must have a free Miro account (startups with a paid account are not accepted)
         Startups should be less than 7 years old
         Startups must have raised no more than $10M
         Startups must not be owned by a parent organization
         Startups must have less than 30 employees
4. Receive approval from Miro and upgrade your account to the Team plan.
5. Powerup with Miro boards.

fields.Name: AWS
fields.Brief description of the provider: Cloud computing platform offering services like storage and computing power.
fields.What you get:
💰 $5,000 in AWS promotional credit valid for 2 years
💰 A year of AWS Business Support (up to $10,000).
👨‍💻  1:1s with a solution architect (book here: https://aws-startuploft-emea.com/meet-aws-expert)
👨‍💻  Personalised events and workshops exclusive for startups (including an CEO,CTO accelerator programs) https://aws-startup-lofts.com/emea/
🚀  Non-equity CEO/CTO accelerator (apply here: https://aws-startuploft-emea.com/program/accelerator)
fields.Caveats, Conditions, Catch:
- Conditions apply: https://aws.amazon.com/awscredits/
- AWS credit packages are not additive. Meaning, you will only receive credits equal to the difference between the two Activate packages, same with the Business Support credits.
fields.How to get it:
1. Go to: https://console.aws.amazon.com/activate/
2. Choose “Portfolio Program” and not “Founders Program”
3. Use the following Organization ID (case sensitive): 0rdZ7

fields.Name: Recruitee
fields.Brief description of the provider: Recruitee automates recruiting for startups.
fields.What you get: 🎁 Free Scale plan for 4 months, no strings attached.

1. Fill in the exclusive Xpreneurs form: https://share.hsforms.com/1hQh9cv3kR8K3dTIZIsCcRA1lm9c
2. Wait for approval and get onboarded.
3. Start recruiting fast!

fields.Name: HubSpot
fields.Brief description of the provider: HubSpot for Starups provides marketing, sales, and CRM services for startups.
fields.What you get:
We’ve partnered with HubSpot to help your startup grow and scale better, and faster.
Are you eligible?
If your startup is a current participant or alumni of UVC Partners and meets the following funding criteria:
1. A startup with under $2 million in funding
Get up to 75% off HubSpot software in your first year, 50% off in the second year, and 25% off in year three.
2. A startup that has raised over $2 million in named funding up to and including Series A
Get up to 50% off in your first year, and 25% off year two.
HubSpot for Startups pricing applies to net-new customers purchasing Professional or Enterprise level products.
*** HubSpot for Startups pricing applies to net-new customers purchasing Professional or Enterprise level products. Starter-level products are excluded.***
fields.How to get it:
(1) To be instantly accepted, apply using our organization's unique referral link: https://app.hubspot.com/signup/hubspot-for-startups?partner-code=oMtQUUW1v13y Referral Code: oMtQUUW1v13y

(2) Or submit an application for review at hubspot.com/startups.

fields.Name: ACCPL
fields.Brief description of the provider: ACCPL provides accounting software
fields.What you get: 🎁 Take a look at these slides for a detailed description of the perk!
fields.How to get it:
1. Correspondence: with Team - ACCPL via through XPRENEURS’ E-Mail Perks Team of contact Mr. Nicolas / Mr. Timo.
2. Kick-off Discussion with Start-up
3. NDA (Non-Disclosure Agreement) Signing: for meeting & information Exchange purpose
4. Expectation exchange: discussion at length regarding with Start-up and ACCPL
5. MSA (Master Servioce Agreement)
6. PO (Purchase Order) with defined scope cost and timelines
7. Pre-acquisition check list: Sharing the detailed list of Accounting work
8. Cloud handover: details for transaction detail & supporting
9. KT (Knowledge Transfer) to start work, if any
10. Start Delivering.

fields.Name: GitHub
fields.Brief description of the provider: Github is the largest provider for code repositories
fields.What you get:
💰Get up to 20 seats of GitHub Enterprise free for one year and 50% off in year two.
Get access to GitHub’s complete platform to build your business all in one place.
Get a startup-friendly onboarding experience, office hours, and technical best practice sharing.
fields.Caveats, Conditions, Catch:
Must be associated with a current GitHub for Startups partner.
Must be an early-stage startup that is either bootstrapped or funded (up to Series A).
Must not be a current GitHub Enterprise customer or have previously received credits for GitHub Enterprise.
To qualify for 50% discount in year two, you must sign up for a 2nd year of GitHub Enterprise immediately following the end of your 1st year.
The 50% discount is for up to 20 seats.
fields.How to get it:
1. apply at
https://resources.github.com/startups/?pid=XPRENEUR
2. Wait for approval start building

fields.Name: Google
fields.Brief description of the provider: Google Cloud for Startups provides cloud computing services, including compute, storage, networking, machine learning, and artificial intelligence.
fields.What you get:
💰 $2,000 in initial startup credits, with opportunities to receive additional credits for being at Xpreneurs, and up to $350k.
🔑 Access to events (https://cloudonair.withgoogle.com/startup) and accelerators (https://developers.google.com/community/accelerators).
💻 1:1 mentorship, dedicacted training, and technical support.
🎁 Additional credits may be available for Google Workspace, Google Maps, Google Ads, Google Play, Qwiklabs, and more.
fields.Caveats, Conditions, Catch:
'- Not currently enrolled in the Startup Program.
- Located in a Google Cloud territory.
- Received Equity Funding.
- Has a publicly available company website and a unique company email domain.
- A valid Google Cloud Billing Account ID matching your company’s unique domain (http://console.cloud.google.com/billing).
- Not have been acquired or IPO’d.
fields.How to get it:
1. Visit cloud.google.com/startup and click on "Apply to program". Note: The ecosystem program will not be advertised as it is a private program.
2. Fill out the form and select "UnternehmerTUM" in "Accelerators, incubators or platform partners that have supported your startup".
3. Upon review of your application you will receive an approval email from the Google for Startups Cloud Program team.

fields.Name: CloudFlare

This offer is only available for  startups that are new customers with fewer than 100 employees and no more than Series B funding.
Key Benefits:
- 6 months free of Zendesk Suite and Zendesk Sales CRM (any edition)
- 30% off first annual subscription after initial 6 month free period
- 1-on-1 onboarding with a dedicated Startup Success specialist
- VIP access to our community programs, experts, and events
- Requirements:
- Must be a new Zendesk customer
- Must have fewer than 100 employees
- No more than Series B funding
- Additional Resources:
- A fun What is Zendesk video
- A self-guided tour of Zendesk Suite Software
- Zendesk for Startups One-Pager (PDF Attached | Online Version)

fields.Name: Microsoft Azure
fields.Brief description of the provider: Microsoft Azure is a cloud computing platform offering services like AI, storage, networking, and security for businesses to build, deploy, and manage applications.
fields.What you get:
Free Microsoft Software as well as €1,000 in GitHub Credits, €2,500 in OpenAI Credits and €150,000 in Azure Credits. Founders Hub is a platform that will democratize access to the technology, resources, and support that will allow startups to innovate and grow.
Microsoft has been proud to build an incredible network of global partners – from accelerators and incubators to venture capital firms and founder communities.  We are particularly proud to partner with UnternehmerTUM and appreciate the encouragement you’ve provided to entrepreneurs seeking to apply to the Microsoft for Startups program.
Going forward, the startups in the network will be able to apply for access to Microsoft resources directly through Founders Hub, eliminating the administrative burden for our partner community.  While startups will no longer require a partner-specific referral code, we look forward to continuing our relationship with you to support entrepreneurs on their company-building journey.
More information on Founders Hub is available in the one-pager attached. We also set up info sessions for your startups to join, talk to us, and learn about the program: Microsoft for Startups DE & A (eventbuilder.com). Please feel free to share them with your community
fields.How to get it:
Microsoft for Startups is now more accessible than ever.  Any founder interested in the program can sign up directly on the website. 

In case you are interested feel free to use the following link and let valuecreation@uvcpartners.com know.

https://www.microsoft.com/de-de/startups

fields.Name: SectorPi
fields.Brief description of the provider:
SectorPi is an AI-powered platform that streamlines and accelerates R&D grant applications, such as the R&D Tax Allowance ("Forschungszulage").

With AI-driven automation and expert support, SectorPi empowers companies to secure funding faster and more cost-effectively than traditional agencies - with a 100% success rate to date.

While built as a product-first solution, SectorPi ensures that companies always have access to dedicated grant experts, providing guidance throughout the entire process, all the way to grant disbursement.
fields.What you get:
Get up to 20% off!

SectorPi operates on a success-based fee.

Standard pricing: 5% or 8% of the grant amount, depending on the service level.
Special offer for UnternehmerTUM startups: 4% or 7% instead.
fields.Caveats, Conditions, Catch: Offer valid for the first funding application.
fields.How to get it:
To access our special discount, simply book a free, non-binding introductory call here:
https://meetings-eu1.hubspot.com/victoria13?uuid=60739f4a-e843-4d30-b59c-b9a221929277

Or schedule it via our website:
https://www.sectorpi.com/contact

Just mention that you're part of the UnternehmerTUM network.

fields.What you get:
⭐50% off Mathematica or SystemModeler licenses (Single machine or network licensing configuration)
🎁25% off Wolfram Engine, Mathematica Core Extension or gridMathematica
🛒25% off all Premier Service subscriptions for up to 3 Years after first purchase
👨‍💻1:1 training session with Harald Farcas (one session for each requester)
🤴Priority channel access for submitting talks to the Wolfram Technology conference (US or Europe) or Wolfram Webinars.
fields.Caveats, Conditions, Catch:
1. The company must be no more than two (2) years old on the date on which the initial order is received, and may not have previously been awarded a Wolfram Start-Up Discount
2. The organization may purchase any number of products, however, the number of products discounted through this offer may not exceed the following:
- Five single machine Mathematica licenses or one 5-Process Network Mathematica license
- Five single machine System Modeler licenses or one 5-Process Network System Modeler license
- Five Mathematica Core Extensions
- One gridMathematica
fields.How to get it:
1. Contact Harald Farcas from Additive: harald.farcas@additive-net.de (and CC XPRENEURS) with the reference: "Wolfram Startup Discount for XPRENEURS"
- Submit desired configuration (Single machine, floating license, ...)
- Provide proof of registration with date
2. Harald Farcas will provide an official offer which then has to be ordered by the Start-Up

fields.Name: Tally
fields.Brief description of the provider: Tally provides simplest forms for startups.

fields.How to get it:
1. Go to: https://help.tally.so/startup-program  and fill in the application.
2. Select Xpreneurs in the list and Use the code: xpreneurstally2511
3. Get approved by Tally.
4. Start making forms te easiest way!

fields.Name: Autenti
fields.Brief description of the provider: Autenti provides EU eSignature for startups.
fields.What you get: 💰 25% discoutn of any plan! - e.g. PRO Plan yearly: 240€ -25% = 180 EUR, e.g. PREMIUM Plan  444€ - 25% = 333 EUR/yearly.
fields.Caveats, Conditions, Catch: - Pay yearly.
fields.How to get it:
1. Get a free account (up to 5 documents for free/month) https://account.autenti.com/register
2. Email:  xpreneurs@autenti.com ask for 25% discount for a plan (before upgrading) see plans: https://autenti.com/en/pricing/autenti-platform
3. Get discounted invoice and clear it, autenti will activate your plan.
4. Start securelly signing contracts and documents online compiant with EU regulations!

fields.Name: We Love No Code
fields.Brief description of the provider: We Love No Code provides no-code development services
fields.What you get: $2,000 in credits for a welovenocode.com development subscription. The credits are valid for a maximum of 4 months and every month 500$ can be redeemed.
fields.How to get it:
1. Go to the TUM VL  exclusive link: https://welovenocode.com/?utm_source=partner-discount2000&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=tumvl

2. Have scheduel a call with the No-Code team and discuss your options.

3. Get a 1 week trial for $9 to see wether it suits you.

4. Pay the subscription with your applied credits and start developing with no code.
